title: minerjones
author: minerjones
content: 6 lots of silver crypto goodness up for grabs!LOT 1: YPS Bitcoin "B" silver 3ozSTARTING BID: 0.0026BTCLOT 2: YPS Dogecoin "D" silver 3ozSTARTING BID: 0.0026BTCLOT 3: 2021 Niue $2 Cyber Orange, colorized silver 1ozSTARTING BID: 0.0034BTCLOT 4: 2003 Canada $5 Holographic Maple Leaf, silver 1ozSTARTING BID: 0.0012BTCLOT 5 & LOT 6: Element Card 12x 1g silver "BTC" barsSTARTING BID: 0.0026BTCSTARTING BID PER LOT: SEE ABOVEMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER COIN/CHIP PER LOT: 0.0001BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: AUGUST 5th, 2023, 14:00:00 PDT**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOT.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid PER LOT.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC. A signed PGP message will be sent to winner with payment addressSHIPPING: Based on location and preferenceOWNER: NOT DISCLOSED

comments.author: 2stout
comments.body: On lot 4, reverse, it that a milk spot or a mark on the airtite?

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: What's the story with these 1g silver bars? Love their looks, guess I'm just a sucker for tiny silver Bitcoin themed stuff.Any numbers on mintage etc.? Are there similar bars out there?Thanks.In any case:Lot 5: 0.0027

comments.author: minerjones
comments.body: Quote from: 2stout on August 02, 2023, 02:34:23 PMOn lot 4, reverse, it that a milk spot or a mark on the airtite?The mark is on the capsule.Quote from: Kryptowerk on August 02, 2023, 04:11:50 PMWhat's the story with these 1g silver bars? Love their looks, guess I'm just a sucker for tiny silver Bitcoin themed stuff.Any numbers on mintage etc.? Are there similar bars out there?Thanks.Apparently "Element Card" is a brand of holders for small bars.I do not know the mintage on these particular bars, but I have seen other similar 1g bars
